messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2957
messages.msgSnippet: ... Wanna come to Germany?  I can only legally have you in my house for 10 consecutive days (the army has wierd regs about their housing), but if you go
messages.messageBody:
1/29/03 21:12:

> I'm thinking about having my kids do some traveling, getting to know other
> places around the country or even the world.
>
> Are there others here that would be willing to host an unschooler for a few
> weeks?
>
Wanna come to Germany? I can only legally have you in my house for 10
consecutive days (the army has wierd regs about their housing), but if you
go someplace overnight, we can start counting all over again.

brenda
friedberg, north of frankfurt,
on the train lines.
